name: Color Moments
description:
Become a color master! Blend beautiful paints to create and discover new colorful combinations. Find the perfect mix to match the swatch and level up. Unlock more stunning designs with each win.

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your iTunes account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- A network connection is required to play.
- A network connection is required to enable certain features/access certain content.
- For information about how Creatif Studios collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.creatifstudios.games/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please contact us at: support@creatifstudios.games
